      • calculatePermutations

        public java.math.BigInteger calculatePermutations(int n,
                                                  int r)
        Calculates the number of permutations of r number of items from a group of n number of items, where order matters.
        Parameters:
        n - the total number of distinct items
        r - the number of items to be chosen
        Returns:
        the number of permutations of r items chosen from n distinct items
